responses.text: Hi, good to hear from you! You have new goals for the week? Tell me with `>`+ your goal.
Good choice! I will help you to reach it! You can retrieve your week's goals by typing `show goals`
I don't get it - you want to create a new goal? Type "new goal:" and what you want to achieve this week
:hugging_face: These are your goals of the week:
You can be very proud that you reached that goal! Your remaining goals are:
Bye, see you later this week! In case I am asleep and you need me, just wake me with: `/wakeup`
